languages.text: Whenever the wearer is able to perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of vengeance. The wearer's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.
languages.original_text: Совершая атаки по возможности, владелец наносит +<u>бонус ИНТ</u> урона дополнительно. Получаемый урон от атак по возможности уменьшается на <u>бонус ИНТ</u>.

traits.locale_text: Attacks of opportunity deal an additional +<u>(INT bonus)</u> damage, and incoming damage from attacks of opportunity is decreased by −<u>(INT bonus)</u>.
Whenever the wearer is able to perform an attack of opportunity, they gain +1 stack of vengeance. The wearer's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +<u>(AGI bonus × vengeance stacks)</u> damage.

Whenever the wearer is able to perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of vengeance. The wearer's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} × vengeance stacks)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

Whenever the wearer is able to perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of vengeance. The wearer's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

languages.text: Когда персонаж может совершить {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g}, он получает +1 уровень эффекта "возмездие". Эта атака наносит +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is able to perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of vengeance. The wearer's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Совершая атаки по возможности, владелец наносит +<u>бонус ИНТ</u> урона дополнительно. Получаемый урон от атак по возможности уменьшается на <u>бонус ИНТ</u>.
Совершая атаки по возможности, владелец наносит +<u>бонус ИНТ</u> урона дополнительно. Получаемый урон от атак по возможности уменьшается на <u>бонус ИНТ</u>.

Когда персонаж может совершить {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}атаку по возможности{/g}, он получает +1 уровень эффекта "возмездие". Эта атака наносит +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g} дополнительно.

languages.text: 当装备者可以发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}时，获得1层“复仇”效果。装备者的借机攻击额外造成{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is able to perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of vengeance. The wearer's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 借机攻击造成的伤害提高，等同于<u>（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}）</u>。受到的借机攻击伤害降低，等同于<u>（智力加值）</u>。
当装备者可以发动{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}借机攻击{/g}时，获得1层“复仇”效果。装备者的借机攻击额外造成{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6}点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。

languages.text: Cuando el portador puede lanzar un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, gana +1 acumulación de venganza. Los ataques de oportunidad del portador infligen +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is able to perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of vengeance. The wearer's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Los ataques de oportunidad infligen +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g} )</u> de daño y el daño recibido de ataques de oportunidad se reduce en −<u>(bonificación por INT)</u>.

Cuando el portador puede lanzar un {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}ataque de oportunidad{/g}, gana +1 acumulación de venganza. Los ataques de oportunidad del portador infligen +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.

languages.text: 使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を成功するたびに、ヴェンジェンスが1つ蓄積する。使用者が機会攻撃をすると、+{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6}の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is able to perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of vengeance. The wearer's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 機会攻撃でのダメージが+<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g})</u>増加し、機会攻撃による被ダメージが-<u>(INTボーナス)</u>減少する。
使用者が{g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}機会攻撃{/g}を成功するたびに、ヴェンジェンスが1つ蓄積する。使用者が機会攻撃をすると、+{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6}の追加{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。

languages.text: Immer wenn der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} ausführt, erhält er +1 Stapel Rache. Die Gelegenheitsangriffe des Trägers fügen zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is able to perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of vengeance. The wearer's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Gelegenheitsangriffe fügen zusätzlich +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g})</u> Schaden zu und durch Gelegenheitsangriffe erlittener Schaden sinkt um −<u>(INT-Bonus)</u>.

Immer wenn der Träger einen {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}Gelegenheitsangriff{/g} ausführt, erhält er +1 Stapel Rache. Die Gelegenheitsangriffe des Trägers fügen zusätzlich +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zu.

languages.text: Lorsque l'utilisateur effectue une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, il bénéficie de +1 cumul de Vengeance. Les attaques d'opportunité de l'utilisateur infligent +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
languages.original_text: Whenever the wearer is able to perform an {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attack of opportunity{/g}, they gain +1 stack of vengeance. The wearer's attacks of opportunity deal an additional +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Les attaques d'opportunité infligent +<u>({g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}INT{/g})</u> points de dégâts supplémentaires et les dégâts subis sont réduits de -<u>(bonus d'INT)</u>.

Lorsque l'utilisateur effectue une {g|Encyclopedia:AttackOfOpportunityFullGlossary}attaque d'opportunité{/g}, il bénéficie de +1 cumul de Vengeance. Les attaques d'opportunité de l'utilisateur infligent +{uip|Damage|b9acbc4e35d74c4b81eac7b50c8926f6} points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} supplémentaires.
